SemiPy.helper.paths.confirm_dir(path)[source]¶
SemiPy.helper.paths.create_symlink_of_all_files(src_dir, new_dir)[source]¶

Creates a symlink of all files in src_dir to new_dir :param src_dir: Path to where the files are :type src_dir: str :param new_dir: Path to where the files should be linked :type new_dir: str

Returns

None

SemiPy.helper.paths.join_states(this_state, inherited_state)[source]¶

This will join states for the __getstate__ function in pickling objects with parent classes :param this_state: The state to be added to inherited_state :type this_state: tuple :param inherited_state: The state inherited from parent class :type inherited_state: tuple

Returns: tuple of joined state

SemiPy.helper.paths.separate_states(state, num_of_items)[source]¶

This will separate states for the __setstate__ function in pickling objects with parents and children :param state: Current state :type state: tuple :param num_of_items: Number of items to be taken off :type num_of_items: int

Returns

tuple of tuples for the state of this object and the rest of the inherited state
